items.name: DIPA
items.desc: ﻿﻿ This bold, juicy DDH DIPA is the biggest beer we've ever done. Extensively dry-hopped with Mosaic & Citra for a beer bursting with grapefruit, mango & pineapple notes.

items.name: Lager
items.desc:
4.4% abv - 330ml can
An unfiltered Czech Pilsner made with Hallertau Blanc hops & fermented cold for 6 weeks. A fresh, crisp lager with subtle hints of gooseberry.
Awarded BRONZE in the SIBA 2017 South East Regional Keg Heats

items.name: The Wild Card Project: Cory Samuels
items.desc:
The Wild Card Project is an ongoing collaboration between the brewery and artists, designers and creatives. We aim to celebrate unsung heroes, overlooked brilliance and those with a more unusual approach. For our first instalment, we are working with an upcoming local artist, Cory Samuels.
Enjoy a case containing all of the beers from this project, which includes:
DDH Pale, 4.5% - Brewed in collaboration with Earth Station Brewery. A juicy citrus IPA with notes of coconut, clementines, lemon zest from Citra and Sabro hops. Fermented cool and double dry hopped for clean, tropical and zesty flavour.
Simcoe IPA, 7.4% - Dry hopped with Simcoe, Citra and Zeus. This is a dank, juicy IPA with punchy tropical fruit flavours of Pineapple and Mango with a fiercely zesty undertone.
Enigma IPA 5.5% - A hoppy, hazy double dry hopped West Coast IPA made with Simcoe and Enigma. With a dry hop rate of 21g/l, expect big tropical flavours with a fresh berry finish.
You can see Cory's other work here : @neter_krafts
